Key.English: Military Air Component Commander
Joint Forces Air Component Commander
Enable Debug:
Enables Module Debug
Persistent:
Enables external Database persistence
Radio Messages:
Broadcast radio messages on ATO activity
Faction:
Select the faction for air taskings.
Available ATOs:
Select the type of air tasking orders, in order of priority. Choices are SEAD, DCA, CAP, CAS, Strike, Recce
Airspace Markers:
Enter the marker names representing the airspace managed by this module
Place a MACC module to provide Combat Air Patrol and Suppresion of Enemy Air Defenses over your airspace. Sync to an AI Commander module to enable Recce, Strike or Close Air Support requests
Create HQ:
Selects HQ objective close to the module or spawns an appropriate composition
Place Anti-Air:
Places Ground Based Air Defenses around the existing MACC HQ
Place Air Assets:
If there are no available air assets, then place additional assets at the nearest airbase or helipad
Generate Player Tasks:
Automatically generate player Air Tasking Orders (CSAR, CAS, Strike)
Resupply:
Enables resupply of air assets. If LOGCOM is available to AI OPCOM then air assets will be ordered from LOGCOM.
All callsigns, this is %1, %2 forward airbase has not been established. No air assets available for tasking. Out.
All callsigns, this is %1, %2 forward airbase established at grid %3, Air Tasking Orders to follow. Out.

All callsigns, this is %1, %2 forward airbase at grid %3 is compromised. Relocating to alternate. Air combat operations unavailable until further notice. Out.
All callsigns, this is %1, %2 has requested %3 at grid %4. Air Tasking Order to follow. Out.
All callsigns, this is %1, aircraft unavailable, air combat operations suspended. Requesting replen. Out.
All callsigns, this is %1, request for %2 at grid %3 denied. Aircraft not available. Out.
All callsigns, this is %1, scrambling %2 on ATO %3 at grid %4. Out.

All callsigns, this is %1, %2 on station at grid %3. Commencing %4 now. Out.
